content.text: Match ends, FC Schalke 04 3, Lyon 0.

Attempt saved. Jérémy Pied (Lyon) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Anthony Réveillere with a cross.

Attempt missed. Jérémy Pied (Lyon) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Kim Källström.
Goal!  FC Schalke 04 3, Lyon 0. Klaas-Jan Huntelaar (FC Schalke 04) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Atsuto Uchida with a cross.
